message: I'm excited to offer you this great product, and I think you'll really love it! Would you like to make an offer on it?
I'm interested in the product, but $180 is a bit steep for me. Would you be willing to consider a lower price?
I understand you're looking for a better deal, but I'm not quite ready to go that low. I can offer you a compromise at $140, but I'm not willing to go any lower than that.
I appreciate your compromise, but $140 is still a bit out of my budget. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle at $130?
I'm getting closer to your price, but I still need to make a profit. I can offer you a deal at $135, but that's as low as I'm willing to go.
I'm getting close to your price, but I still think we can find a better deal. Would you be willing to meet me at $125?
I'm starting to think we're not going to meet in the middle, but I'm willing to make one more compromise. I can offer you the product at $135, but that's my final offer.
I understand you're making a final offer, but I'm not willing to pay $135. I'm willing to meet you halfway between your original price and my target price. Would you consider $110?
I'm not willing to go as low as $110, but I'm willing to make one last concession. I can offer you the product at $128, but that's as low as I'm willing to go.

I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but I'm still not comfortable with $128. I've already offered $110, and I'm not willing to go any higher. I think it's time for me to consider other options. Would you be willing to meet me at $120?
